content: Neonatal Pneumonia due to Amniotic Fluid Aspiration
Varicose Veins of the Lower Leg (Right).

Young was diagnosed with Neonatal Pneumonia due to Amniotic Fluid Aspiration; according to the hospitalization records of Kingsport General Hospital, patient A. qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Richmond General Hospital and Kingsport General Hospital, when were patients M. Young and A. Davis admitted?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Richmond General Hospital, patient M. Young was admitted on 28th, February; according to the hospitalization records of Kingsport General Hospital, patient A. Davis was admitted on 1st, March.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Richmond General Hospital and Kingsport General Hospital, who was admitted earlier, M. Young or A. Davis?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: M. Young was admitted on February 28th, and A. Davis was admitted on March 1st. Therefore, M. Young was admitted earlier.
